title: Sudden departure
creator_credit: ONF | NFB, Marcel Martin and Georges Dufaux
brief_description: When an infant or small child enters hospital, there can be dangerous emotional shock caused by separation from the mother. Filmed at a children’s hospital, this film examines the nature of the child’s deprivation. A psychiatrist discusses what parents can do to lessen fear and anxiety. (Awards: Cairo; La Plata.)
